div.bibl: The Philippine Messenger, Vol. II, No. 15, Sept. 1935EVENTS AT RANDOMBy J. P. Pizarro

body.p: Morally, the joint affair of the F. A. C., and A. F. C., last Sunday, Sept. 1st, at the Majestic Hall was a complete failure. The affair was a success financially, but it failed in its avowed policy of friendship and goodwill. The popularity contest initiated by the respectable leaders of the club, men of social distinction, disclosed the most outrageous social poverty imaginable. The evening bred personal animosities against the chosen judges.
